thread.section_title: Business & Finance News - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: The Bully Trumpet

author: wsjcom
title: The Bully Trumpet
text:
President Trump held a nearly 80-minute press conference on Thursday defending his Administration, assailing the media and along the way making some good news. Political reporters are bewildered by his unconventional style, but the spectacle was Mr. Trump at his Trumpiest.
“We have made incredible progress. I don’t think there’s ever been a President elected who in this short period of time has done what we’ve done,” as the President characterized his “fine-tuned machine” and “one of the great cabinets ever assembled in...
